WYSIWYM.model
Class SGEdge

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Edge
      WYSIWYM.model.SGEdge
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, TreeComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueryEdge
public class SGEdge
extends Edge
implements Comparable

SGEdge is an edge in the Semantic Graph.

Version:
1.0 24-10-2006, 1.1 20-09-2007, 1.2 08-02-08
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

public static SGEdge copySGEdge(SGEdge oldEdge,
                                Map<String,SGNode> existing,
                                SemanticGraphTransformer sg,
                                SGNode source)
                         throws NameAlreadyBoundException
Constructs a copy of the given edge, and adds it with copies of the source and target to the Semantic Graph

Parameters:
oldEdge - SGEdge to copy
existing - HashMap with nodes already copied (potential source and targets)
sg - Semantic Graph Transformer
source - Source of the new SGEdge, already copied
Returns:
copy of SGEdge
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException - very unlikely
